com.articulate.nlp.semRewrite

Class CommonCNFUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.articulate.nlp.semRewrite.CommonCNFUtil

  • public class CommonCNFUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of static functions that heal dealing with CNF findPath will find all paths between two literals in the CNF string findOneCommonCNF will try to find the intersection CNF among a list of CNFs getCommonCNF will try to find common CNF pair between sentences
